p: The hazard ratios estimated for dengue infections during the first year of follow-up were significant for females, participants living in Ticul or Progreso, one or more infections confirmed in the household, and being dengue na√Øve at baseline. In the final model after controlling for baseline dengue status age was not significantly associated with the outcome. To our knowledge, this is the first dengue cohort study that uses survival analysis as a tool to better understand the transmission dynamics of dengue and other arbovirus.
